Confirmation of the fishing tournament i: Commissioner Putnam, and other members of the Cabinet participated, as reported by the Palm Beach Post's Dara Kam.
Verification of the fishing regulations: which state that redfish must be between 18 and 27 inches long to be harvested, with a limit of one redfish per day.
